summary: So because it's been so long...
body:
So because it’s been so long…

I need a serious refresh of who wants to be tagged where… so let’s make this easy!

Reply to this post with what lists you want to be on for tags…


The current separate lists I have tags for:

  1. Forever tags: This covers anything I write.
  2. Marvel Tags: Marvel characters only. If you only want specific characters, please specify
  3. Supernatural Tags: Supernatural characters only. If you only want specific characters, please specify
  4. LOTR/Hobbit
  5. Vikings (I have some catching up to do)
  6. Harry Potter
  7. Doctor Who


Specific Story Tags:

  1. The Ghost (Steve Rogers)
  2. When The Sun Found The Moon (Steve Rogers)
  3. Death of a Bachelor (Tony Stark)
  4. Parkour (Steve Rogers)
  5. Refractory (Sam Winchester)

Tagging who I have currently:

@theoneandonlysaucymo @mcuimxgine @dustycelt @iwillbeinmynest @myluvislikewow @alifeburied @feelmyroarrrr @i-less-than-three-you @angryschnauzer @addictivewriter @melconnor2007 @shamvictoria11 @yknott81 @avengersgirllorianna @booya–18 @katbird787 @avengerofyourheart @reniescarlett @yuhkii-kaze @evil-little-pwincess-scientist @katilla-the-hun @captainrogerss @theashhole @catsoftheapocalypse @themcuhasruinedme @4theluvofall @tinaferraldo @blue1928 @imhereforbvcky @pineapplebooboo @shamvictoria11 @quicksilverbells @passionoffire @xenaathena @palaiasaurus64 @the-villainsandheroes @princess-of-erebor1992 @dslocum89 @marvelfanatic

Thank you everyone!! I know this is a lot but it’s good to have an updated list!! ❤❤ Especially with all the name changes! Please please please spread the word if you can!! I greatly appreciate it!

blog.name: taaroko
blog.title: Squee into the Void
blog.description: I'm pretty much a lurker, but you might occasionally find fandom things here, which could include Buffyverse, the MCU, Vampire Diaries, Harry Potter, Avatar, and Supernatural. If you want my fanfiction and fanart, I have the same username on fanfiction.net, Ao3, and deviantart.

title: Asgardian Mead and Valkyrie
body:
Remember this bit from Age of Ultron?

Well, do you remember that Thor’s full line is “See, this was aged for a thousand years, in the barrels built from the wreck of Brunnhilde’s fleet. It is not meant for mortal men.” I had to rewind that bit twice the last time I watched it to make sure I didn’t mishear Thor. I did not.

Brunnhilde’s fleet.

BRUNNHILDE’S FLEET.

As in, this Brunnhilde?

Is this the story Asgard believes about how the Valkyries fell, or is it the story of one of their other campaigns? A successful one that nevertheless reduced this “fleet” to wreckage fit for building casks? Whatever it is, Thor seems to consider it a glorious battle, which fits with how much of a fanboy he is of Valkyries.

blog.name: dangerousenthusiastobservation
blog.title: Dangerous Enthusiastic Observation
blog.description: Waitress, Rambler, Literally just says shit, I started drawing recently?

body:
Banned Topics

We were discussing Marvel (mcu and comics) and Logan was saying something about one of the people being able to destroy the whole world without doing anything because he can cure sickness just by getting close. Like, he said something about being able to take away Spidey’s powers and dude.

This kid is 13 and he had two 17 year olds, a 19 year old, a 20 year old and a 21 year old arguing that born mutants aren’t sick so that wouldn’t work because it’s a genetic, not an illness.

Then he was saying something else and he was just like “In one universe” and my cousin (big Hulk stan right there. Like Forrest worships Hulk) was like “What universe?”

Logan, with the most serious face, says, “Marvel Universe.”

Then I went into an almost 15 minute rant about multiple universes, some of the ones I remember specifically and how Logan is a fuck ass.

Our house is no longer allowed to discuss politics, conspiracy theories, global warming, Infinity War and Goblins. (Infinity War is an iffy thing, depends on who is debating it.)

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: I won't let them forget you
title: I won't let them forget you
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2mflV89

by Firey_Mana

*Spoilers for Infinity war part 1*

In the wake of the battle of Titan, a badly injured Tony Stark returns to Earth to find out a mass funeral will be held for the world, including a ceremony for the fallen Avenger’s.
When Tony realizes only Spider-Man will be honored, and Peter will lay forgotten, he asks Aunt May for her indirect consent in revealing his identity to the world.

Words: , Chapters: ½, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Spider-Man - All Media Types, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, May Parker (Spider-Man), Ned Leeds, Michelle Jones, Flash Thompson, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Steve Rogers, Clint Barton, Thor (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Rocket Raccoon, Shuri (Marvel), Okoye (Marvel), James “Rhodey” Rhodes
  • Relationships: May Parker (Spider-Man) & Peter Parker, Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Ned Leeds & Peter Parker, Michelle Jones & Peter Parker, Peter Parker & Flash Thompson, Peter Parker & Avengers Team, Peter Parker & Everyone
  • Additional Tags: Angst, Lot’s of angst, Post-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), Not A Fix-It, kind of a continuation, Post-Spider-Man: Homecoming, Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie) Spoilers, Pre-Avenger’s 4, Hurt Tony Stark, Hurt Aunt May, Hurt Ned Leed’s, Hurt Michelle Jones, Hurt No Comfort, No Plot/Plotless, Happy Ending, Never heard of that


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2mflV89

blog.name: broadwaycatastrophy
blog.title: Hat Trick
blog.description:
"The revolution never ends.
It was hallowed as a triumph of the righteous over the wicked.
But the battle lines were not clearly drawn.
The real war, the one between good and evil, was fought within ourselves."

summary: Sam: *late for an Avengers meeting or something* Sorry I’m late, I was taking care of... important things Bucky: *running in,...
body:
Sam: *late for an Avengers meeting or something* Sorry I’m late, I was taking care of… important things

Bucky: *running in, disheveled* hE PUSHED ME DOWN THE FUCKIN STAIRS 

extra

Steve: *in the distance, probably* Language!

summary: fandommemporiumm is right, I really like drawing buff men and I no longer know how to draw skinny men. I had to draw buff Steve...
caption: fandommemporiumm is right, I really like drawing buff men and I no longer know how to draw skinny men. I had to draw buff Steve the way I would normally draw him so that I could figure out how to draw him skinny.

reblog.comment: fandommemporiumm is right, I really like drawing buff men and I no longer know how to draw skinny men. I had to draw buff Steve the way I would normally draw him so that I could figure out how to draw him skinny.

Trading cards from comic books, including Marvel, DC Comics, Image and more. 

#comicbooktradingcards

summary: fandommemporiumm said: I've always seen you drawing more buff men per say, and I'm in a skinny/pre-serum Steve Rodgers mood....
caption:
fandommemporiumm said: I’ve always seen you drawing more buff men per say, and I’m in a skinny/pre-serum Steve Rodgers mood. Either that or Jotun Loki. 

I went with skinny Steve plus pre Winter Soldier Bucky comparing muscles like the dorks they are.

reblog.comment:
fandommemporiumm said: I’ve always seen you drawing more buff men per say, and I’m in a skinny/pre-serum Steve Rodgers mood. Either that or Jotun Loki.
